AUTHOR: Injabie3#1660
INSTALL_MSG: The welcome module was installed. Run [p]welcome to see the commands.
NAME: Welcome_beta
SHORT: Sends a welcome DM to new server members on join. Has additional requirements.
DESCRIPTION: Sends a welcome DM to new server members on join.  Sends as a rich embed, with configurable title and description. Requires the check utility from https://github.com/Rapptz/RoboDanny/tree/master/cogs/utils
